title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips Bring your students to Salem Maritime. The park offers programs and tours for children grade three through college and beyond.  All Field Trips   Field Trip    Salem Sets Sail Learn More     Curriculum Materials Prepare your students for a visit to Salem Maritime and extend their learning after your visit. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    Wharves of the World Learn More
